description:
Take down the out-of-control mechs!
Head for the enemy base while escaping from the satellite guns.
Go Attacker-chan!

<Features>
1. Enemy mechs and robots have a cute military sci-fi style.
2. Two game modes: Normal mode with infinite respawns and Expert mode with no respawns.
3. Play time is 30 minutes to 1 hour.
4. Simple controls: Move / Jump / Melee attack / Shoot / Dash
name: Attacker-chan!
intro: 2.5D short, roguelike action game with cute animations.
